label_hario_switch_tetsu_kasuya_step_01:
0:00 - 0:29: 1st pour
(Switch Open) pour {firstPourInGrams}g of water, at {firstPourTemp}°C.
label_hario_switch_tetsu_kasuya_step_02:
0:30 - 1:14: 2nd pour
(Switch Open) pour {secondPourInGrams}g of water (Total: {secondPourTotal}g), at {secondPourTemp}°C.
label_hario_switch_tetsu_kasuya_step_03:
1:15 - 1:44: 3rd pour
(Switch Closed) pour {thirdPourInGrams}g of water (Total: {thirdPourTotal}g), at {thirdPourTemp}°C.
label_hario_switch_tetsu_kasuya_step_04:
1:45 - 3:00:
(Switch Open) let the water flow until 3:00. Close the switch.
